nodes.title: GH-42: add intersection merge method to Policy and Directives
brought back popovers working without side-effects
fixes #44: use integer instead of String in URIs and Origins for port
disallow policy union if either policy contains report-uri
fixes #27: resolve 'self' during optimisation and merge
GH-38: Add 'self' to be valid keyword for ancestor-source
report errors on obsolete or not-yet-in-spec directives
add basic human-readable csp report logging
added bootstrap tooltips. need better styles
Fixes GH-13: implemented nonce related policy methods.
set request timeout for the client, handle the error
check if hostname of the request should be loaded
use SRI (subresource integrity) on 3rd party script
listen on both ports 80 and 443, use HSTS.
Validate CSP String syntax hilighting complete
use Token objects instead of Strings in tokeniser; expose in demo API
enforce policy to require origin. Use Origin instead of URI where appropriate
make sure policies cannot be merged if have different origins
URI class + relative paths in report-uri
update location of CLA check script in .travis.yml
Added base-uri allows checks to policy
fixes #234: treat newline, carriage return, and form feed as whitespace
change JDK from Oracle to OpenJDK
Make worker-src fall back in the correct order
Fix null dereference found by Infer
Warn about asterisk being used in media type.
Warn about deprecation of referrer directive.
GH-170: Revisit warning message around effects of 'strict-dynamic'
fixes #168: Refactor host-part matching to strictly follow the spec
fixes GH-161: Check if a policy is using strict-dynamic
fixes #91: allow secure variant of scheme when only insecure is given
fixes GH-155: Allow "*" to match scheme of protected resource
Added Missing Allows Checks to Policy
fixes GH-144: add support for `require-sri-for` directive
more tests for querying media type, make hash case-insensitive
fixes GH-123: local scheme (GUID) matching should be case-insensitive
Add tests to cover intersect and union merge stratages case insensitiveness
Add missing word in report-to error message
fixes #111 and #113: correct whitespace handling in tokeniser
fixes #107: newly added directives should be taken into account when …
added helpers to get log messages as a stream
Warn about "sandbox" values that aren't in HTML
Add support for some more directives
fixes GH-87 : Add query API for child-src and frame-src
fixes #85 : support querying for allowed frame ancestor
make salvation aware of block-all-mixed-content directive
warn about potential typos is source-list
eliminate non-protected scheme sources in source lists that contain *
add GUID support and add tests for various wildcard HostSources
fixes #64: add policy methods to merge a directive
bug fixes and cleanup of HostSource wildcard handling
fixes #59: union merge should produce other if any of the values is
fixes GH-47: demo app option to choose merge strategy
